title: Ranked Issues
body:
Hi guys,

Just wanted to know whats happening this season...Basically its a bit frustrating in ranked at the moment. not that im pro or very good at the game however im not really enjoying it.

A: I'm thrashing the enemy team complete white wash 40 kills to 7 kills on their behalf 

OR

B: i'm getting thrashed so hard in game you may as well surrender at 15 minutes into the game....

Its not fun either way I think the matchmaking is broken, somethings up. I find that last season every player was around my skill level and now it seems like there is a massive influx of complete noobs and complete pros.

Its getting to the point im thinking F*** IT im going to DOTA 2

Anyway that's my little tiff cheers

replies.body: its always like that when a new season starts... give it a month or 2 for people to get where they are supposed to be and games get closer.
